params._baseFeePerSecond: The base fee per second to charge in wei
params._coolDownPeriod: The cool down period for a token in seconds
params._hardCap: The maximum duration allowed in seconds
params._suffix: The contract suffix that is checked against the token address
params._treasury: The treasury address where fees are sent

highlightToken(address,uint256).details: BookedUntil must be in the past to allow a new highlight.

params.token: The address of the token to highlight

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Only the owner can call this function.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setBaseFee(uint256).details: Only the owner can call this function

params.baseFeePerSecond_: The base fee per second to charge in wei

setCoolDownPeriod(uint256).details: Only the owner can call this function

params.coolDownPeriod_: The cool down period in seconds

setHardCap(uint256).details: Only the owner can call this function

params.hardCap_: The maximum duration allowed in seconds

setTreasury(address).details: Only the owner can call this function

params.treasury_: The treasury address where fees are sent

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Only the owner can call this function.

EXP_THRESHOLD().notice: The threshold after which the fee increases exponentially

GROWTH_FACTOR().notice: Growth rate for 50x fee on 1 hour vs 10 minutes

MIN_DURATION().notice: The minimum duration allowed in seconds

baseFeePerSecond().notice: The base fee per second to charge in wei

bookedUntil().notice: The timestamp when the latest highlight expires

coolDownPeriod().notice: The cool down period for a token in seconds

hardCap().notice: The maximum duration allowed in seconds

highlightToken(address,uint256).notice: Allows msg.sender to highlights a token for a given duration, paying the fee in native currency

quote(uint256).notice: Quotes the fee for highlighting a token for a given duration

setBaseFee(uint256).notice: Sets the base fee per second

setCoolDownPeriod(uint256).notice: Sets the cool down period for a token

setHardCap(uint256).notice: Sets the hard cap for the duration

suffix().notice: The contract suffix that is checked against the token address

tokenCoolDownUntil(address).notice: The timestamp when a token can be highlighted again

treasury().notice: The treasury address where fees are sent
